description: This market resolves to YES if the price of Bitcoin (BTC) reaches or exceeds $100,000 USD on any major exchange before December 31, 2024 23:59:59 UTC. Otherwise, it resolves to NO.
creator: 0x504b635B7E22F8DF7d037cf31639811AE583E9f0
